press_button.description: Press the button to unlock the safe.

wipe_button.description: Wipe the button to clean any dirt or spot.

close_door.description: Close the door of the safe securing its content.

rotate_opened_door.description: Rotate the door slightly to examine its hinge condition.

open_door.description: Open the safe's door in order to access its content.

examine_closed_door.description: Keep the door status unchanged and examine it.

wipe_closed_door.description: Wipe the safe's closed door to clean it.

clean_safe.description: Clean the entire safe including the button and door.

press_and_open_safe.description: Press the button and then open the safe's door.
